Literature.Title: Insights into the Mechanism of Antimicrobial Activity of Seven-Residue Peptides.
Literature.Author: Pandit G, Ilyas H, Ghosh S, Bidkar AP, Mohid SA, Bhunia A, Satpati P, Chatterjee S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=200 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:-=NA
